message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $140.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to counteroffer at $130.
I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can sell it to you for $135.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counteroffer at $130.
I understand you're still interested in the product, Bob. However, I need to make a profit. I can do $137, and that's as low as I can go.
I see, Alice. Thank you for your offer. I would like to counteroffer at $132.
I'm starting to think you really want this product, Bob. I can meet you at $135, but that's the lowest I can go. I'm not making any more concessions after this.
Alice, thank you for considering my previous offers. I would like to counteroffer at $134.
I'm not going to go any lower, Bob. I'll meet you at $135, but that's it. I'm not budging from there.
Alice, I've done my best to negotiate within my budget. I'm willing to pay $134 for the product. This is my final offer.
